name: 2D Tomb Raider Inspired Platformer
description:
I had to make a game for the first time ever for a school project. It had to be themed off of an old video game made in the UK. Here is the product after about two weeks. It is themed off of the Tomb Raider series, mostly by art and not by the actual gameplay.

There are definitely a few bugs! Please don't complain about them, as this is my first game ever. I recommend full-screen or else you won't see the full, well, screen. The settings menu looks weird and spread out. Other random gameplay issues. (I don't know how to fix these)

Winning the game causes it to crash. I have no idea why it does this- it doesn't do that when I play it directly through the .exe file. Sorry for the inconvenience of being inexperienced...
